issue.title: [CF 479] Adding Tooltip Upon Icon Mouseover
issue.body:
Feature request to have checkbox in Options for Tooltip showing upon icon mouseover.

Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555 | Imported from CurseForge issue #479 | Raw

comments.body:
Too many icon types with no tooltips, getting buff/debuff tooltips is a nightmare with they way they are checked now, and so on and so on. This just isn't going to happen. Someone else could probably implement this hackily using the framework available now, but its not going to be me.

Kinda defeats the purpose of TMW offering at-a-glance combat information. Reading a tooltip isn't at-a-glance.

Sorry for taking so long to respond, but this definitely wasn't something that I wanted a knee-jerk implementation of.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
